sentences.en: He stepped lightly over the puddle.

sentences.cn: 他的椅子放在一堆书本杂志中.

sentences.en: I have rarely seen such a huge puddle of milk.
sentences.cn: 我几乎没看过这么大的奶水坑.

sentences.en: I was wet and I must somewhere have stepped in a puddle.
sentences.cn: 我身上湿了,一定是在什么地方踩进过水坑.

sentences.en: Mind you don't tread in that puddle.

sentences.cn: 她绊了一下,跌在水坑里.

sentences.en: She used to make all these chocolate puddle puddings, you know, with the sauce underneath and all this sort of thing.
sentences.cn: 她过去喜欢做巧克力夹心布丁，你知道吧，就是里面有巧克力酱之类的东西的。

sentences.en: The boy hopped the mud puddle and ran down the walk.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩跳过泥坑,沿着人行道跑了.

sentences.en: The boy jumped across the puddle.

sentences.cn: 那个傻瓜今天早上把我们的报纸扔进水坑里了.

sentences.en: The dog licked up water in a puddle.
The puddle is full of water.
